snippet: Tampa Bay running back Doug Martin has been suspended four games for violating the NFL's policy on performance enhancing substances and said Wednesday he's entering a treatment facility rather than appeal the ban....
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay running back Doug Martin has been suspended four games for violating the NFL's policy on performance enhancing substances and said Wednesday he's entering a treatment facility rather than appeal the ban.

headline.main: Bucs RB Martin Suspended, Entering Drug Treatment Facility
headline.print_headline: Bucs RB Martin Suspended, Entering Drug Treatment Facility
